item.title: Dan Tana, Former Actor Who Opened Iconic Hollywood Celebrity Hangout, Dies at 90
item.description: Dan Tana, who opened the iconic West Hollywood celebrity hangout Dan Tana’s restaurant in 1964 and ran it until selling in 2009, has died. He was 90. The restaurant released a statement, saying,
